txt.en: 'Those across the bridge have many supplies they have ravaged from lands further south. Take their supplies and give them to me. I will show them what it means to cross me and not give up their land!'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Note: This quest is only available while the quest, The Fushaum Resolution, is underway.</rgb>
'Ah, this is your finest accomplishment yet, [placeholder]. I will certainly shower you in jewels if you keep this up!'
A guard spotted you sneaking around!
Steal supplies from Fushaum Bal South ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Fushaum Bal North: Need for Greed
Supplies can be found in Fushaum Bal South.\n\nYou should steal supplies from Fushaum Bal South while avoiding the guards.
Khirgi can be found at Fushaum Bal North.\n\nYou should talk to Khirgi.
<rgb=#FF0000>Don't let the Fushaum Guards spot you</rgb>
The encampment of Fushaum Bal is a lawless home to evil men once under the command of Sauron.
